DESCRIPTION: Fuse different `Fragments` to create an animated card
FUSE_DESC: The fusion lab is where Sofi experiments and creates new things for the players! Exciting features come to life here.
FUSE_DESC2: <:_:979009081325019156> Animated: Collected `Fragments` from pulls are fused here to make an animated card. You will need all 8 fragments of a character in order to animate their card!
FUSE_DESC3: <:_:979009081325019156> Levelling: Fuse duplicates to earn upgrade points for your cards
FUSE_DESC4: <:_:979009081325019156> Versions : Combine `Elixir` with your cards to get a new version
FUSE_DESC5: <:_:979009081325019156> Multi: Try your luck and you might obtain duo or even trio cards
FRAG_INFO: `Once 100 Versions of a GIF are fused, its fragments will stop spawning. Use the fragments or trade them before they become useless.
FUSE_CONFIRM: > Are you sure want to convert {{charName}} into their animated version?
FUSE_CONFIRM2: > This process will consume `8` `Fragments` and is irreversible!
FUSE_CONFIRM3:
> You will receive an animated version of the chosen character between gen 1-100
> Gens do not repeat in for animated cards
ALL_FUSED: There already are 100 animated versions of this card in circulation
NAME: Name
